title: WeWow
description: Hosted by Mindy Thomas and Guy Raz of  Wow in the World, WeWow  is a project-based learning podcast with activities curious kids and grownups can bring to life in their world! Built around themes like Earth Day, Back-to-school, Black History Month and Summer Camp,  WeWow  invites kids to tinker like real scientists by trying experiments or activities at home and sharing their findings through photos, videos, or audio recordings.

episodes.title: Camp WeWow Magic Week Day 5
episodes.description: It's the last day of camp here at Camp WeWow! Today, we're featuring your camper call-ins around the Camp WeWow campfire! You can redeem your Magic Week badge at tinkercast.com/camp, and share what you discovered with us this summer at tinkercast.com/share! Safe travels, campers!

episodes.title: Camp WeWow Magic Week Day 4
episodes.description: It's Magic Week at Camp WeWow! Today, we're using science to magically stick a straw through a potato!! Visit tinkercast.com/resource/experiment-stick-a-straw-through-a-potato for directions to today's activity and share what you're tinkering with at tinkercast.com/share! What's your favorite Camp WeWow memory?! Call us at 1-888-7WOW-WOW to share what you've loved about Camp WeWow! You just might get featured around the Camp WeWow Campfire this Friday!

episodes.title: Camp WeWow Magic Week Day 1: Eyes on the Behind
episodes.description: It's Magic Week at Camp WeWow! Today, we're listening to one of our favorite episodes of Wow in the World, "Eyes on the Behind!" This week, we've got a few tricks up our sleeve with crafts, activities, and games for you, so be sure to check back for more tomorrow! Visit tinkercast.com/camp for directions to our daily activities and challenges. You can share your tinkerings and tales with us at tinkercast.com/share and at 1-888-7WOW-WOW for the chance to be featured at the “campfire” this Friday!

episodes.title: Camp WeWow Shark Week Day 5
episodes.description: It's the last day of Shark Week here at Camp WeWow! Today, we're featuring your camper call-ins around the Camp WeWow campfire! We'll see you back next week with brand new crafts, activities, experiments and more! But until then, head to tinkercast.com/camp to catch up on this week's activities and to print your Shark Week Badge! Then, share what you discovered with us at tinkercast.com/share!

episodes.title: Camp WeWow - Spider Week Day 5: Spider-cise!
episodes.description: It's Day 5 of Spider Week, and we're hearing from campers who called in! To print your Web Weaver badge, head to tinkercast.com/camp. Thanks for joining us at Camp WeWow this summer! You can join Mindy and Guy Raz on more scientific adventures by listening to "Wow in the World" for episodes every Monday and Friday. Happy trails, Campers!
